content: I'm actually thinking of asking my family to chip in and help with the planning and decision-making process. We've got a big family and it's always hard to get everyone on the same page. Do you have any suggestions on how to make this process more collaborative and efficient? Oh, and by the way, speaking of family gatherings, among the many dishes we served at the party, lasagna was her favorite - my mom's 60th birthday party, that is.
